bibl.title: Letter from A.S. von Mansfelde to Mabel H. Lazear, November 15, 1907

div1.p: Von Mansfelde discusses his work to increase Mabel Lazear's pension.

div1.head: Letter from A.S. von Mansfelde to Mabel H. Lazear, November 15, 1907
div1.opener:
Nebraska State Medical Association
A. S. v. Mansfelde, M. D., Treasurer
“Quality Gill,” Ashland, Nebraska
No.2726.
November 15th 1907.
Mrs. Mabel H Lazear.
Santa Barbara. Cal.
Dear Mrs Lazear:
div1.p:
Well, yesterday I had that
long looked for interview with Congressman
Hinshaw, about 2 hours! He thoroughly
understands your husbands part in the in-
vestigations in Cuba and he fully approved
my suggestion that Senator Knox, Pennsylvania
be asked to introduce a bill for you in the
Senate, identical with that which passed for
Mrs Reed, and copies of which Surgeon General
Wyman was kind enough to send me,- the
substance of which is that you get 125 dol-
lars a month in lieu of your dinky 21
dollars. Cong, Hinshaw also told me that
Cong. John Dalzell, who lives in Pittsburg,
and a friend of your uncle Thomas C. La-
zear, is a warm personal friend of his,
and that Cong. Burton, whom I know, who
is vice president of the American Med. Ass
this year, occupies a seat just back of his.
If I live, I will submit this bill for ap-
proval to the National Legislative Council
Nebraska State Medical Association
A. S. v. Mansfelde, M. D., Treasurer
“Quality Gill,” Ashland, Nebraska
No.---------------
on the 10th day of December next, at
Chicago, instead of Washington; I am
quite sure it will be accepted as present-
ed by me (You know I have already, before
the meeting, been appointed Chairman to of a
Committee to prepare a pension bill for
you). In the meantime Congressman Hin-
shaw will introduce you and Mrs Carrolls
bills (identical ones) in the House, as soon
as it is ready to receive bills-. and he will
hand exactly like worded bills to Senator
Knox for you, and to Senator Dick for
Mrs Carroll. I truly believe we will suc-
ceed.! I have already written to Mr Thom-
C. Lazear and expect to hear from him
soon. What are you to do? Just pray
that I may keep my health until I
have succeeded in this work of mine
and with love to your children and you
believe me most sincerely
